ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_isofld | |- ( F e. oField <-> ( F e. Field /\ F e. oRing ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_simprbi | |- ( F e. oField -> F e. oRing ) |
| 3 |  | #P_orngogrp | |- ( F e. oRing -> F e. oGrp ) |
| 4 |  | #P_isogrp | |- ( F e. oGrp <-> ( F e. Grp /\ F e. oMnd ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simprbi | |- ( F e. oGrp -> F e. oMnd ) |
| 6 | 2, 3, 5 | #P_3syl | |- ( F e. oField -> F e. oMnd ) |
| 7 |  | #P_omndtos | |- ( F e. oMnd -> F e. Toset ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( F e. oField -> F e. Toset ) |
